de.griefed.serverpackcreator

Class ServerPackCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.ServerPackCreator

  • @SpringBootApplication
 @EnableScheduling
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:application.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:serverpackcreator.properties")
public class ServerPackCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Launch-class of ServerPackCreator which determines the mode to run in, takes care of initialization and dependency injection and, finally, running ServerPackCreator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ServerPackCreator.CommandlineParser
      Check the passed commandline-arguments with which ServerPackCreator was started and return the mode in which to run.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerPackCreator

        public ServerPackCreator(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initialize ServerPackCreator and determine the ServerPackCreator.CommandlineParser.Mode to run in.
        Parameters:
        args - Commandline arguments with which ServerPackCreator is run. Determines which mode ServerPackCreator will enter and which locale is used.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize ServerPackCreator with the passed commandline-arguments and run.

        For a list of available commandline arguments, check out ServerPackCreator.CommandlineParser.Mode

        Parameters:
        args - Commandline arguments with which ServerPackCreator is run. Determines which mode ServerPackCreator will enter and which locale is used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the VersionMeta could not be instantiated.

      • web

        public static void web(java.lang.String[] args)
        Start Spring Boot app, providing our Apache Tomcat and serving our frontend.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments passed from invocation in main(String[]).

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the run fails.

      • run

        public void run(ServerPackCreator.CommandlineParser.Mode modeToRunIn)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Run ServerPackCreator in a specific ServerPackCreator.CommandlineParser.Mode.
        Parameters:
        modeToRunIn - ServerPackCreator.CommandlineParser.Mode to run in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the run fails.

      • checkForConfig

        public boolean checkForConfig()
        Check for old config file, if found rename to new name. If neither old nor new config file can be found, a new config file is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated, so we can inform the user about said newly generated file.

      • checkServerFilesFile

        public boolean checkServerFilesFile(java.io.File fileToCheckFor)
        Checks for existence of defaults files. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Parameters:
        fileToCheckFor - The file which is to be checked for whether it exists and if it doesn't, should be created.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated, so we can inform the user about said newly generated file.

      • checkDatabase

        public void checkDatabase()
        Ensures serverpackcreator.db exists. If the database does not exist, it is created.

      • updateCheck

        public void updateCheck()
        Check for update-availability and exit with status code 0.
